response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its importance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic worth and your perceived valuation, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
